channel.title: About on Jeong-Gyu Kim
channel.description: Recent content in About on Jeong-Gyu Kim

item.title: About
item.description: About Me Welcome! I am a EACOA Postdoctoral Fellow at National Astronomical Observatory of Japan, Mitaka, Japan. Combining theory and numerical simulations, my researh focuses on understanding how star formation proceeds in giant molecular clouds in the interstellar medium; how stellar feedback from massive stars (radiation, stellar winds, and supernovae) interacts with the surrounding interstellar medium and subsequently affects the lifecycle of giant molecular clouds and star formation cycle in galactic gas disks.

item.title: Contact
